title: Best Skins?
body:
Wondering what everyone's personal Top 10 is. Here's mine (was going to go 10, 9, 8, etc., but the forum auto-corrects it to 1, 2, 3, etc.):

Ten: Steel Legion Garen.
Nine: Poro Rider Sejuani.
Eight: Pool Party Lulu.
Seven: Project Zed.
Six: Dunkmaster Darius
Five: Primetime Draven.
Four: Arcade Riven.
Three: Surprise Party Amumu.
Two: Star Guardian Lux.
One: Forecast Janna.

What's yours?

replies.body:
Heh, cool! :) I want Poro Rider Sej!

Here are mine:

**10:** _Annie in Wonderland_
**9:** _Winter Wonder Orianna_
**8:** _Surprise Party Fiddlesticks_
**7:** _Pumpkinhead Fiddlesticks_
**6:**_ Blacksmith Poppy_
**5:** _Omega Squad Teemo_ (though I don't play Teemo)
**4:** _Winter Wonder Lulu_ 
**3:** _The Mighty Jax_
**2:** _Firefighter Tristana_
**1:** _Red Baron Corki_

I got Red Baron in a mystery gift yesterday :) Super excited because it's a legendary legacy hehe
Oh gratz! I wish I had a cool legendary skin darn xD the only legacy I have is Snow Leopard Nidalee.
Snow Leopard is cool. I actually have so many legacies that I didn't list haha, I've been pretty lucky with mystery gifts.

Lucky! My friend mystery gifted me and I got...

Greybeard Veigar. >_>

They meant well so I use it for them though.

Bahahaha oh I've got some crappy skins too. I really dislike the eSports skins, because I don't cheer for a particular team and I feel like I'm fangirling when I use one. I got TPA Nunu and SKT T1 Lee Sin. I'd give them away if I could.

I also have every skin for Swain and both crappy skins for Poppy. Almost every skin for Renekton, and three skins for Sona.
I don't enjoy playing any of those champs (except Poppy, and I use Blacksmith) :P

The quadruple chance for legendary (and eSports) skins yesterday inspired me to mystery gift myself one... and I got TPA Orianna. I just knew I was gonna get an eSports skin, but I risked it anyway hoping I'd be lucky enough to get something like Forecast Janna. Oh well. eSports skins are all pretty meh, and like you I don't cheer for a particular team (although I'm kinda rooting for Fnatic this year).

Yeah haha I exchanged a bunch of skins during the quad chance.
TPA Nunu, SKT Lee, Red Baron Corki, and Pentakill Sona.
Corki made it worth it.

I got Red Baron Corki as a mystery skin gift as well! xD On my other account, though. Leveled up a second account to get a fresh start in ranked and have only two skins (TPA Orianna and Ironside Malphite).
Haha nice! :P

Ah, about the eSports thing I agree. I like Poppy's Battle Regalia, and I use it whenever there's the random reason I play her. I have DJ Sona so I play her alot, and eesh the rest of those skins are pretty bad O-o it happens though.

I got Pharaoh Amumu from a mystery skin as well :o
Oooh that's cool! I'm pretty sure that's a legacy haha
It is? I coulda sworn it was just a random skin xD
Yessir it is! :)

I feel it's kind of hard to label them in a specific order, so I'll just say that mine aren't in a particular order of preference (I also feel bad that I couldn't fit Lulu in there);

1. Super Galaxy Rumble
2. Winter Wonder Orianna
3. Star Guardian Lux
4. River Spirit Nami
5. DJ Sona
6. Atlantean Syndra
7. Final Boss Veigar
8. Galactic Azir
9. Heartseeker Ashe
10. Bewitching Nidalee

DJ Sona
Challenger Ahri
Star Guardian Lux
Foxfire Ahri
Winter Wonder Lulu
Pool Party Leona
Rocket Girl Tristana
Frostfire Annie
Lunar Goddess Diana (I don't own it but I wish I did it's so pretty >_<)
Justicar Syndra

This is in no particular order though, I love them all evenly.

This was actually kind of difficult? 

1. Justicar Syndra
2. Bloodmoon Kalista
3. Pool Party Leona
4.  Star Guardian Lux
5.  Warrior Princess Sivir
6. Firefox Ahri
7. Woad King Darius
8.  Warden Sivir
9.  Sandstorm Katarina
10.  Blackfrost Anvia
I have primetime draven and soul reaver draven. Prine time gets old fast.
Same. Got Prime as a mystery and was gifted soul. Soul is the better skin imo but my friends like Prime a lot better

10. Ironside Malphite
9. Cutlass Quinn
8. Special forces Gankplnk
7. Battleboss/ boom boom Blitzcrank
6.Marauder Alistar
5.TPA Orianna,
4.TPA Ezreal
3.Creator Viktor
2.Bilgewater Katarina
1. Winter Wonder Orianna.

Idk...i feel like im missing a few...

Nice to see love for Ironside Malphite. It's the first Malphite skin I didn't hate. Love the steampunk vibe it has.

Likewise, Winter Wonder Orianna is the only Orianna skin I like.

Oh, and Battleboss Blitzcrank has worn on me due to the fact that it reminds me of Toy Story with the color scheme and similarities to Zurg.
You don't like Obsidian? That's my favorite Malph skin.

1 being the best and 10 being the least best.

1. Blackfrost Anivia
2. Bear Cavalry Sejuani
3. Final Boss Veigar
4. SKT T1 Zed
5. Dragonslayer Pantheon
6. Soul Reaver Draven
7. Snowstorm Sivir (although I don't own it ;C)
8. Bloodmoon Thresh
9. Iron Solari Leona
10. Giant Enemy Crabgot (I was going to joke and make this number 1, but I know it's not my favorite skin, but I still like it!)

#10. annie in wonderland
#9.underworld wukong 
#8. SSW talon
#7. zombie brand
#6. underworld twisted fate
#5. snow day ziggs
#4. masked shaco
#3. snowday singed
#2. SSW singed
#1.  riot squad singed
1. Mundo Mundo

Don't buy skins it's a scam.

http://www.auplod.com/u/daopul5c344.png
